Pickle Jar

Given a list of names, pick one at random Given a list of names, shuffle them into random order

First Try: “Object Oriented”

class pickle_jar
  initialize(list)
   puts list.pick_a_random_name
  end
  def pick_a_random_name
    "George"
  end
end

Second Try: A “One Liner”

  ruby -e 'a=%W(bob joe chr jan frk crl cbw dog jr );\
    puts "The Winner is: #{a[rand(a.size)]}"'

Third Try: From the previous century: CGI

Forth Try: Rack, like all the cool kids do things
